contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary|saran}} '''Saran''' may refer to: In '''Places''': * [[Saran, Kazakhstan]], a city in Kazakhstan * [[Saransk]], Russia * [[Saran, Loiret]], a commune of the Loiret Department, France * [[Saran district]], Bihar, India * [[Saran division]], Bihar, India * ''Sárán'', the Hungarian name for Şerani village, [[Borod, Bihor|Borod]] Commune, Bihor County, Romania * [[Saran, Afghanistan]], a locality in Afghanistan * [[Saran, Iran]], a locality near Tehran, Iran * [[Saran, Hormozgan]], a village in Hormozgan Province, Iran * [[Saran, Kerman]], a village in Kerman Province, Iran * [[Saran-e Bala]], a village in Lorestan Province, Iran * [[Saran-e Pain]], a village in Lorestan Province, Iran * Saran, alternate name of [[Sari Kuchakeh]], a village in Lorestan Province, Iran * Saran, alternate name of [[Sagharan-e Olya]], a village in Qazvin Province, Iran In '''People''': * [[Saharan (gotra)]], clan of Jats in India * [[Saran (director)]] (born 1975), Tamil film director * [[Shyam Saran]] (born 1946), Indian politician * [[Shriya Saran]] (born 1982), actress * Saran, a legendary [[King of Ulster]] In '''Others''': * [[Saran (plastic)]], a plastic once used to make Saran brand food wrap and other products ==See also== *{{intitle|Saran}} * [[Sarin]], a poisonous nerve agent {{Disambig|geo}}
